org.chocosolver.solver.variables

Interface FilteringMonitor

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ExplanationEngine, FilteringMonitorList

    public interface FilteringMonitor
extends Serializable
    Monitor filter generated during resolution. Defined initially for explanation engine. Created by cprudhom on 09/12/14. Project: choco.

    • Method Summary

                              int value,
                              int old,
                              ICause cause)
        Explain the removal of [old,value[ from var, due to cause.

        Prerequisite: value should belong to var

        Parameters:
        intVar - an integer variable
        value - the current lower bound
        old - the previous lower bound
        cause - the cause
